addr: Lower Thames St London, Gt Lon EC3N 4DT GB
title: Christmas Boat Party - 13th December 2015
desc: CHRISTMAS EDITION: ? Two of the must do things while you are in London is to go to the Church and go on a Thames River Boat Party. ? So we thought we would put the two together and create the ultimate boat party. ? Sooo?Grab your Santa Suit and come celebrate the festive season with hundreds of fellow Santa's on the river Thames. ?We will be substituting the dull milk and cookies for a day filled with naughtiness and jolly god damn fun!! Our boat party will give you the opportunity to party with fellow Church goers while taking in the amazing sights of London that can only be seen on the Thames. An adventure not to be missed!!? ? The boat will leave from Tower Millennium Pier at 12pm sharp on 13  December 2015. ? ** Our Church boat parties sell out every year so get in quick to avoid disappointment.
